recipe_name: Grilled mushrooms with goats' cheese and beetroot and walnut salsa
author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the grill to medium. For the grilled mushrooms, heat the olive oil in an ovenproof frying pan and fry the mushrooms on both sides for 2-3 minutes. Divide the goats' cheese equally among the mushrooms and sprinkle over the thyme, honey, black pepper, garlic and walnuts. Place under the grill and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbling. For the beetroot and walnut salsa, place all the salsa ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. To serve, place the grilled mushrooms onto serving plates with a dollop of salsa.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  2 Portobello mushrooms,  100g/3½oz soft goats' cheese,  1 sprig thyme, leaves only,  2 tsp honey,  freshly ground black pepper,  ½ garlic clove, finely sliced,  30g/1oz walnut halves,  4 small cooked beetroots, chopped,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  handful fresh parsley, chopped,  2 tsp balsamic vinegar,  2 tbsp olive oil,  30g/1oz walnut halves, chopped
